__e: I think that man is mature for another reason. Not only for not stealing, not killing, etc., and for being a good citizen.
You're younger than me and no matter how mature you are for your age or how much of an old soul may be, some maturity just comes with time.
And that I should not ask your age because you were so much more mature than your years.
Now, be a grownup and either tell Mommy and Daddy you don't wanna see them, or I'm picking you up at 7:00 for dinner.
Well, there's just so much that I could say, but I think I'll be a bigger person than you and not say it.
The future you who said that was a reliable and nice man.
